surveyIntro.title: Pain Medication Log
surveyIntro.text: We will now ask you some questions regarding your medication intake and how it affects your daily activities. Please answer these questions truthfully.

surveySummary.title: All Done!
surveySummary.text: We appreciate you taking the time to complete this survey

surveySteps.title: Question 1
surveySteps.text: How would you rate the following based on your current medication?

questions.prompt: Your current medication is effective at alleviating pain.
You are able to carry out your daily activities with no problem.
You sleep undisturbed throughout the night.
